Html:
I'm considering separating our the RazorEngine.Templates assembly from the main release.  This was intended as a sample assembly for developing custom base templates, and I don't feel comfortable releasing it alongside each core release as it generally means when deploying via NuGet means the HtmlTemplateBase<T> can't be used with a Client Profile target because of its dependency on System.Web (via System.Web.Mvc).

Thoughts?
